data: The organization GreenSprout Foundation is a nonprofit institution.
The organization GreenSprout Foundation operates in the nonprofit industry focusing on environmental conservation and sustainable agriculture practices.
The organization GreenSprout Foundation supports grassroots initiatives that restore ecosystems and promote community farming.
The organization GreenSprout Foundation is located in Austin, TX and maintains a global presence through funding more than 200 projects.
The organization GreenSprout Foundation upholds the values of sustainability, collaboration, and innovation.
The organization GreenSprout Foundation was founded by environmental scientists in 2010.
